bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of cu si 卒死 , sudden [appearance of] death, resulting from an attempt at strangling oneself by committing suicide by hanging. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 25: 凡救縊死者，極 須按定其心，勿截繩，手抱起徐徐解之 , “For all attempts to rescue someone who [ appears to have ] died from hanging , it is of utmost importance to stabilize the [victim’s] heart. One must not cut the rope. Rather one should gently lift [the body] and this way loosen the [strangling]”.
